October 23, 1957
Mr. John H. Lerch
Crosley Broadcasting Corporation
3165 Olentangy River Road
Columbus 2, Ohio
Dear John:
Would be glad to send you the Journal and Newsletter. Attached is blank which
with $7.50 individual membership fee attached, will take care of that.
Iâ€™m leaving to Bob Underwood, whose area they fall in, to answer your other
questions.
Best regards
Harry J. Skomia
